h1: How Many Calories in a Piece of Toast?
assumptions: Standard slice of white bread (~25 g), toasted without butter or toppings; dry heat method.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, brand, slice thickness, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A piece of toast provides ~75 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a piece of toast without butter?
faqs.a: About 75 kcal for a standard white slice.

faqs.q: Does toasting change the calories in bread?
faqs.a: No, toasting doesn't add or remove calories; it just affects texture.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a piece of toast?
faqs.a: Around 14 g carbs, with 0.7 g fiber and 1.8 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much protein is in one piece of toast?
Are there healthier alternatives to white toast?
faqs.a: Yes, whole grain or sourdough slices offer more fiber and similar calories.
